column2: an A.M. Eatery////Annoyance 1 - Head to the left of the bar
column3: this is where you can order drinks. However
column4: there is no distinct line (there is a very small sign that says "order drinks here". People cut in front of you and pretty much walk into the bar back area to flag down a bar tender. The bar tenders are so busy they don't care and will serve whoever aggressively gets their attention first. So those who thought we were in line - wrong! People cut
column5: no one cares. It's mass chaos. However
column6: me being a loud mouth spoke up when I saw a woman weaseling her way past me into the Â the bar back area
column7: then giving her order. I got the bartenders attention and she quickly took my order.
